attributes.action: Change the policy for high court injunction of car cruising in the Black Country
attributes.additional_details: We as a car club love to meet up and don’t contend racing, loud music or anything that would harm others. We all come together make friends and to look at other people’s cars but unfortunately due to the high court injunction we car enjoy what we do why ban a hobby what we enjoy we love to do static meets and meet other people we don’t condent racing or annoyance, I think the policy should change as it’s unfair to ban something that is car enthusiasts love to do.
attributes.background: I and a few others have been affected by this high court injunction and got fined and others had to sign a promis for something that we didn’t do, we got accused for holding a car cruise rally, when all we did is hold a car club meet,

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
